title: Hunt Enduro Wide v2 alloy MTB wheels get tougher without extra weight, Trail Wides too!
content:
Hunt’s EWS-proven, affordable alloy Enduro Wide mountain bike wheels get tougher with a v2 redesign that shifts to front & rear-specific rims, and profiles specifically designed to survive the real enduro racing abuse. With similar goals in mind, a re-optimized set of Trail Wide v2 wheels get a 20% improvement in impact resistance, with almost […]

The post Hunt Enduro Wide v2 alloy MTB wheels get tougher without extra weight, Trail Wides too! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
